highlights.name: Vicar Street
highlights.description: Konser ve komedi mekanı, samimi atmosferle ünlü isimler. Dublin gece hayatı ve canlı performanslar.
highlights.tips: Rehbere soru sormaktan çekinmeyin, çok ilginç hikayeler biliyorlar.
highlights.tips_en: Don't hesitate to ask the guide questions, they know interesting stories.
highlights.description_en: Concert and comedy venue with famous names in intimate atmosphere. Dublin nightlife and live performances.

highlights.name: Vice Coffee Inc
highlights.description: Relaxed hangout inside Wigwam featuring coffee from select roasters, plus toasties & sweet treats.

highlights.name: Whelan's
highlights.description: Dublin'in efsanevi canlı müzik mekanı, yeni yetenekler ve ünlü sanatçılar. İrlanda rock sahnesinin kalbi.
highlights.tips: Yerel halkın favori noktalarından biri.
highlights.tips_en: One of the favorite spots of the locals.
highlights.description_en: Dublin's legendary live music venue for new talents and famous artists. Heart of Irish rock scene.
